title: My Website!
text:
Hi! My name is Anna Szalay and this is my website.



Me in Costa Rica



About MeğŸŒ
I am from California and grew up in a small suburb of LA country, where the most interesting thing to do was go to the movies or drive out farther somewhere. However, I lived there my whole life, until I moved to San Luis Obispo for my undergrad at Cal Poly. I did lots of work in rangeland management, interned at a wildlife rehab, and studied abroad in Costa Rica! I discovered a love for nature and conservationâ€¦.
















Now, I live in Hawaii and go to UH Manoa as a graduate student in Botany. I spend my free time hiking, reading, and hanging out with my dogs!


ResearchğŸŒ²
I am a M.S. student in Botany at UH Manoa. I am researching the impacts of the biocontrol agent (Tectococcus ovatus) on strawberry guava (Psidium Cattleyanum). Strawberry guava is very invasive and grows in dense stands that outcompetes other plants. About a decade ago, a biocontrol agent was introduced to slow down strawberry guavaâ€™s vigor. Consequently, I am researching the efficiency of Tectococcus ovatus.


Experience with DatağŸ”¢
I have some experience with coding in R from an intro ecology class I took and some knowledge of intro stat as well. In my undergraduate, I manipulated data for my senior project (mostly just putting formulas into Excel) and eventually stamped the data onto a series of daily images of an ungrazed grassland for a whole year. I made a sort of â€œtimelapseâ€ of the grass as it grew and with each image, the data changed (precipitation, mean and max temp, GDD)! It was fun, and the most Iâ€™ve manipulated data. However, I have also worked with data just in general for some other classes in Excel. I am new to Git/Github and Quarto. I am excited to learn more data management and data analysis in this class and hope to apply to my work.


Fun FactsğŸ‰

I speak Hungarian! My entire family is from there.



Photo by Nikolett Emmert: https://www.pexels.com/photo/city-buildings-under-the-blue-sky-9893366/


I am a twin (my brother goes to Boulder and we are opposites; I love the heat and he loves snow).
I used to ride horses and wanted to be a pro equestrianâ€¦.obviously I did not.ğŸ



My horse, Tango


I own a shepherd husky rescue named Falcon and a cattle dog terrier named Kiko (Wanna check out their insta? click here!).



Falcon





Kiko


I volunteer with the Humane Society on the weekend. I help out with animal care, so if youâ€™re looking for a dog or cat to adopt, let me knowâ€¦!ğŸ¶
